thread.title: Martin G
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Martin G

author: Martin G
title: Martin G
text:
Having only recently discovered, Country Attire, I found that they have a great range of clothing. I ordered several jackets, to try on for size, which arrived on time, by friendly courier. Unfortunately, due to the cut of this particular Barbour Jacket" the sleeves were tight on me.
I returned the items, free of charge and received a prompt refund!
I can't fault Country Attire's service. First rate. Will definitely shop with them again.
